articles.description: Commentary: Apple's little AirPods could see another update this year. There's still room for improvement.
articles.content:
The AirPods (left) and AirPods Pro (right). The original AirPods could adopt the Pro look this year.
Sarah Tew/CNET
Apple may have the new AirPods 3 ready in 2021. After a year spent trapped in my … [+4633 chars]
